Here’s a quick list of some startup and product management resources I find helpful.

Blogroll - Paul Graham - Learn from the master. - Nir and Far - Some of the best advice re: product psychology out there. - Andrew Chen - Growth hacking done right. - AVC - Fred Wilson’s blog. Great comments section. - Hunter Walk - Thoughts from one of my favorite product people. - Steve Blank - Great lean product advice. - Jerry Colona - Jerry is the master of CEO psychology.

Metrics - Metrics Driven Design - 3 Rules to Actionable Metrics - Startup Metrics for Pirates - Lean Analytics - This is a great book on using data to inform product decisionmaking. - IA Ventures - IA Ventures has a fantastic list of budgets, board decks, investor update emails, etc. on their resource site. No need to reinvent the wheel - it’s easy to use this stuff. - Guide to Picking Analytics Packages - pretty good guide from Forrester Research on how to pick an analytics package.

Growth & Distribution - Growth Hacking - Lean Marketing for Startups - Startup = Growth - Mobile App Distribution - this post by Semil Shah is awesome. Really comprehensive look at mobile app distribution and how to approach a mobile app launch.

Company Building - Blakemasters - Notes from Stanford’s CS183 taught by Peter Thiel - The meanest thing Paul Graham said to a startup - Â A good little anecdote about the importance of being brutally honest at a startup. - Romantic lies about passion and entrepreneurship - pretty personal take on some of the challenges of being a founder. - The Science Behind How Super Connectors Scale Their Networks - a good piece that illustrates the power of networking and how to effectively build/activate a network. - Startupery - Startup Best Practices

Raising Money - Paul Graham - Investing Trends - Paul Graham - How to convince investors - On Party Rounds

Mobile Distribution - Ratings and Reviews in the App Store - A Mobile Distribution Framework

Product Management - Product Strategy Means Saying No - The pyramid model & what it means for PM focus - What Is A Product Manager? A Primer For Aspiring Or Junior PMs - We are Product Managers - 42 Rules to Lead by from the Man Who Defined Google’s Product Strategy - A Product Manager’s Job - Be a great product leader - Good Product Manager, Bad Product Manager - How to hire a product manager - What distinguishes the top 1% of product managers from the top 10% - 48 Articles and Books that will Make you a Great Product Manager

Products/Services I Like - Intercom.io - KissMetrics

Design & Wireframing - Responsive Resources - Incredibly thorough list of responsive web design resources. - UX Equivalents for iOS 7,6, Android - Pttrns - Great site for mobile UI examples - Mobile Patterns - PlaceIt - Awesome way to quickly get images for landing page using mockups - GoodUI - Anatomy of a Perfect Landing Page
